Dual Area Bayer 12 Applet

for microEnable IV-FULL x1
for microEnable IV VD1-CL
.

Description
..

The hardware applet Dual Area Bayer 12 enables the simultanuous operation of two Bayer pattern color scale cameras. Supported are all area-scan Bayer cameras in the Base Configuration of the CameraLink standard and a resolution of up to 16,384 x 65,535 pixels.


Highlights
.
  • Support of all gray CameraLink input formats (Single and Dual Tap with 8, 10, 12, 14, and 16 bit/pixel at up to 85MHz)
  • General transfer rate of up to 200MB/s on single line PCIe systems (depending on used applet!). For more information, open microDiagnosis and run a test on your target applet.
  • n-board Bayer filter demosaicking (bi-linear, 12bit precision, correct border handling)
  • On-board pixel reshuffling with support of all popular sensor readout strategies
  • Knee Lookup Table for piecewise linear conversion from 16 bit/pixel to 16 bit/pixel.
  • Basic image processing, e. g. bightness, contrast and gamma-correction.
  • Highly customizable Trigger System
  • Max. image dimension of 16,384 x 65,535 pixel
  • 8bit or 16bit per color component (RGB24/RGB48)
  • Hardware generated image number
  • Regions of Interest support
  • Image selector
  • Latency of a single line
  • Support of RS232 clser interface
  • Camera detection abilities
  • DigI/O
  • CC signals
  • Miscellaneous
.


References
.

SDK Documentation
.
